search.name: 银河铁道999：梅德尔传奇 交响诗 宿命
search.original_name: メーテルレジェンド 交響詩 宿命
search.overview: 注定要被黑暗太阳吞噬的 Rametal 星球脱离轨道1000年的周期……  美丽的Lar Metal 女王Ra Andromeda Promethium，被迫批准天才科学家 Hard Gear 的人类机械化计划，以拯救人们免于饥饿和寒冷。但是，也有人反对强制人类机械化。其中包括 Emeraldas 公主和 Maetel 公主，她们是 Promethium 女王的双胞胎女儿。美丽的公主们开始注意到这个机械化项目背后的可怕阴谋……

title: Di Gi Charat クリスマススペシャル

search.title: Di Gi Charat Christmas Special
search.original_title: Di Gi Charat クリスマススペシャル
search.overview: The Christmas Special aired in December 2000 and featured Piyoko again attempting to capture Dejiko by inviting all the characters on a cruise.

title: ぼくたちピチューブラザーズ・風船騒動の巻

search.title: 我们是皮丘兄弟
search.original_title: ぼくたちピチューブラザーズ
search.overview: 总是活泼好动的皮丘兄弟再度登场啰！虽然它们总是相亲相爱的在秘密基地和大家伙一起玩游戏，没想到两兄弟居然为了一丁点儿芝麻小事却大吵了起来，而且到最后还成了波及整个城镇的大骚动……  总是活泼好动的皮丘兄弟再度登场啰!皮丘兄弟的来到了ムチュール，据说，街道上的宝可梦们有月牙形的什么东西，为了解开谜题的皮丘们前往街上…

title: ピチューとピカチュウのふゆやすみ2001

search.title: 精灵宝可梦：皮卡丘的冬季假期2001
search.original_title: ピチューとピカチュウのふゆやすみ2001
search.overview: On the day before Christmas, Pikachu and its Pokémon friends are playing in a snowy town. But their snowball bowling game goes awry, and Totodile's snowball knocks a passing Delibird out of the sky! Delibird crashes down onto Meowth and Wobbuffet, who were out for an innocent stroll, but a wild Skarmory is annoyed at the racket and sends them all blasting off. Delibird has another bumpy landing, and now it's in a panic because it's lost all the presents that were in its sack. If they're not found by midnight, they won't be delivered for Christmas! Fortunately, Pikachu and its friends will help Delibird find all the presents.

title: 超人ロック～ミラーリング～

search.title: 超人洛克：镜之戒
search.original_title: 超人ロック～ミラーリング～
search.overview: In the space history year of 0375, the killing Plan of Esper and the Imperial Plan met with failure. Run, who had executed these plans because of his partiality for his own self-made computer named Elena, lived together with Locke and Near under their protection. At the same time, Cassandra and Barcov of the Hackers netted the widely dispersed computers in each corner of space, and they succeeded in reviving some abandoned programs. This was the federal administrative computer, Elena. She tried to start the previous Imperial Plan again. When Locke found out about it, he set off to stop it. At the same time, the federal administration which detected something abnormal, also started to move. Involving Run and Near who chased Locke, the confusion was expanding to the entire Galaxy...

title: ポケットモンスター ミュウツー! 我ハココニ在リ

search.title: 精灵宝可梦：超梦重现，风云再起！
search.original_title: ポケットモンスター ミュウツー! 我ハココニ在リ MEWTWO SAGA
search.overview: 在人迹罕至的一块净土上，超梦和复制的宝可梦过着平静的生活，但是发现了超梦的阪木却暗中进行着不为人知的秘密计划，最后连小智一行人也被牵连其中，开始了一场攸关超梦和复制的宝可梦们命运的壮烈战役……
